info.title: AAS Mapper API
info.description: This project provides a tool for mapping proprietary assets from an asset manager serivce like Netilion to the standardized format of Asset Administration Shells and Submodels as specified by the Industrial Digital Twin Association.

tags.name: Mapper
tags.description: Mapping operations from asset source to AAS formats

tags.name: OI4
tags.description: CRUD operations on the AAS repository

post.summary: Submit all submodels referenced by the Asset Administration Shell of a specific asset from asset source to the AAS repository.

json.message: Something was missing on another source
Something was missing on another source

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The asset id in the asset source (for example Netilion asset ID).

parameters.name: id_short
parameters.description:
"idShort" of the submodel belonging to the asset.
Note that the value must be converted from PascalCase to snake_case (for example 'Nameplate' to 'nameplate' and 'ContactInformations' to 'contact_informations').

get.summary: Retrieve submodel of a specific type referenced by the Asset Administration Shell of a specific asset from asset source.
